c:capability.name: DeviceOta
c:capability.c:description: Capabilities for devices that support over the air firmware updates.

c:attribute.name: currentVersion
c:attribute.description: Version of the currently installed firmware.

c:attribute.name: status
c:attribute.description: Status of the current firmware update process.

c:attribute.name: lastAttempt
c:attribute.description: UTC date time of last retry attempt.

c:attribute.name: progressPercent
c:attribute.description: Progress of the current firmware download.

c:attribute.name: lastFailReason
c:attribute.description: Reason for failure of the OTA (offline, timeout, refused, etc.).

c:method.name: FirmwareUpdate
c:method.description: Requests that the hub update its firmware

c:parameter.name: priority
c:parameter.description: The priority of the firmware update. Updates at NORMAL priority may be refused in some senarios.

c:return.name: status
c:return.description: The status code result for the firmware update request.

c:return.name: message
c:return.description: An informative message about the returned status code.

c:method.name: FirmwareUpdateCancel
c:method.description: Requests that the hub cancel an existing firmware update

c:return.name: status
c:return.description: The status code result for the firmware update cancel request.

c:return.name: message
c:return.description: An informative message about the returned status code.

c:event.name: FirmwareUpdateProgress
c:event.description: Sent when a device has been removed for any reason. This may be very specific to the given protocol and require client interpretation.

c:parameter.name: dlProgress
c:parameter.description: The percentage of the firmware that has been downloaded.

c:parameter.name: otaProgress
c:parameter.description: The percentage of the firmware that has been delivered to the device.

c:parameter.name: status
c:parameter.description: The current status of the OTA firmware update. Will transition to COMPLETE or FAILED on termination of the OTA process.

c:parameter.name: reason
c:parameter.description: A message indicating the failure reason

c:parameter.name: fileVersion
c:parameter.description: Name of the file version used for OTA
